feed.title: epilot API Changelog
feed.subtitle: Breaking changes, new features, and significant updates to epilot APIs.

entry.title: 2026-02-22 Entity API
entry.summary: - New table schema attribute type was added

entry.title: 2026-02-20 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - Integration create/update/get response schemas restructured — fields now composed via allOf[IntegrationEditableFields]; SDK consumers should regenerate types

entry.title: 2026-02-20 Core Events
entry.summary: - New TariffChange event was introduced

entry.title: 2026-02-19 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New file_proxy use case type was added — FileProxyUseCase is now a valid variant alongside InboundUseCase/OutboundUseCase

entry.title: 2026-02-19 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - New filterConditions field was added to webhook configs, allowing event delivery to be filtered by conditions

entry.title: 2026-02-18 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New EntitySlugConfig support was added to entity search — accepts per-slug configuration objects with slug, targets, and templates

entry.title: 2026-02-18 Workflows Definition API
entry.summary: - assigned_to field type changed from plain string to oneOf[string, VariableAssignment] — unlocks dynamic variable-based assignment

entry.title: 2026-02-18 Metering API
entry.summary: - POST /v2/metering/readings request now uses a discriminated union on the operation field (CreateOrUpdateBatchReading or DeleteBatchReading)

entry.title: 2026-02-13 Workflows Definition API
entry.summary: - New additional_triggers field was added to flow templates, enabling multiple trigger configurations per flow

entry.title: 2026-02-12 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/integrations//monitoring/timeseries endpoint was added for querying time-series event counts

entry.title: 2026-02-11 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - POST /v1/erp/updates/events (v1) and POST /v2/erp/updates/events (v2) are now deprecated — migrate to POST /v3/erp/updates/events

entry.title: 2026-02-11 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - GET /v1/webhooks/.well-known/public-key endpoint was reactivated with a new required orgId query parameter

entry.title: 2026-02-10 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v3/erp/updates/events endpoint was added — v3 event processing using integration-based authentication

entry.title: 2026-02-10 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - New signingSecret field was added to webhook config responses (returned once at creation time)

entry.title: 2026-02-09 Email Settings API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/outlook/connection:resolve endpoint was added to look up an Outlook connection by email address

entry.title: 2026-02-06 Entity API
entry.summary: - Breaking: POST /v1/entity/taxonomies//classifications — deleted response type changed from object to array

entry.title: 2026-02-06 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/portal/entity//{id}/workflows endpoint was added

entry.title: 2026-02-06 Order Entity
entry.summary: - New coupons relation was added

entry.title: 2026-02-05 Pricing API
entry.summary: - New coupons field was added to order responses

entry.title: 2026-02-05 Automation API
entry.summary: - New NewEmailThreadTrigger trigger type was added to automation flows

entry.title: 2026-02-05 Query API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/query/semantic-model endpoint was added, returning available entity tables, relationships, and query capabilities

entry.title: 2026-02-05 Contract Entity
entry.summary: - New assets relation was added

entry.title: 2026-02-05 Order Entity
entry.summary: - New opportunities and contracts relations were added

entry.title: 2026-02-04 Entity API
entry.summary: - New exclude query parameter was added to GET /v1/entity/schemas for excluding schemas by slug

entry.title: 2026-02-04 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New PUT /v2/portal/notifications/entity:status endpoint was added for batch-updating notification status

entry.title: 2026-02-03 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - New NONE auth type was added, allowing webhook endpoints using standard signature auth only

entry.title: 2026-02-03 Core Events
entry.summary: - New OnDemandSyncContractRequested event was introduced

entry.title: 2026-01-30 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - Monitoring endpoints split — POST .../monitoring/events replaced by separate POST .../monitoring/inbound-events and POST .../monitoring/outbound-events endpoints

entry.title: 2026-01-30 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/portal/metering/reading/allowed-range/ endpoint was added

entry.title: 2026-01-30 Core Events
entry.summary: - New required ackid field was added to all event payloads for delivery acknowledgement tracking

entry.title: 2026-01-29 Partner Directory API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/partners//roles and PUT /v2/partners/{orgId}/roles/{roleId} endpoints were added for partner role management

entry.title: 2026-01-28 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New GET /v1/integrations//outbound-status endpoint was added

entry.title: 2026-01-27 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/integrations//monitoring/access-logs endpoint was added for API access log analytics

entry.title: 2026-01-27 Workflows Definition API
entry.summary: - New messageemailaddress attribute type and attributesubfield were added to decision task conditions

entry.title: 2026-01-27 Event: Service Meter Reading Added
entry.summary: - Payload restructured — single reading fields replaced by meterreadings array; reason/note removed; counterid, direction, status, readingsource added; metercounter replaced by meter_counters array

entry.title: 2026-01-26 User API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/user/navigations and GET /v2/user/navigations/ endpoints were added for navigation configurations

entry.title: 2026-01-23 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST .../monitoring/events and POST .../monitoring/stats endpoints were added for integration monitoring

entry.title: 2026-01-23 Email Settings API
entry.summary: - New Microsoft 365/Outlook integration endpoints were added: connect, disconnect, connection status, shared mailbox management, and OAuth callback

entry.title: 2026-01-23 Pricing API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/public/external-catalog/products and POST /v1/public/external-catalog/products-recommendation public endpoints were added

entry.title: 2026-01-22 Automation API
entry.summary: - New TriggerEventAction action type was added for explicitly triggering event catalog events from automation flows

entry.title: 2026-01-22 Permissions API
entry.summary: - New parent_role field was added to user roles, allowing inheritance from a parent role

entry.title: 2026-01-22 Notification Template Entity
entry.summary: - New notification_template entity was introduced

entry.title: 2026-01-22 Core Events
entry.summary: - operation, activityid, activitytype, and trigger_entity fields were removed from event payloads

entry.title: 2026-01-21 Workflows Execution API
entry.summary: - New AI_AGENT task type was added with AiAgentTask schema

entry.title: 2026-01-21 Core Events
entry.summary: - New triggersourcetype and trigger_source fields were added to all event payloads, identifying the system and source that triggered each event

entry.title: 2026-01-20 Notification API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/notification/templates/send-preview endpoint was added

entry.title: 2026-01-16 Notification API
entry.summary: - New notification template CRUD endpoints were added: list, create, get, update, patch, and delete

entry.title: 2026-01-15 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New v2 integration endpoints were added: GET/PUT/DELETE /v2/integrations/ — v2 integrations embed use cases directly in the response

entry.title: 2026-01-15 Core Events
entry.summary: - New CustomerDetailsUpdated event was introduced

entry.title: 2026-01-14 Data Management API
entry.summary: - Breaking: relatedentitiesanyinclosedorcancelled_status filter type was removed

entry.title: 2026-01-12 Blueprint Manifest API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/blueprint-manifest/blueprints:preview/ endpoint was added

entry.title: 2026-01-09 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New v3 portal management endpoints were added: distribution config, email templates, entity access, extensions, external links, portal config, SSO login, user management, and CAA record validation

entry.title: 2026-01-09 Core Events
entry.summary: - New BillingAccountConnectionRemoved event was introduced

entry.title: 2026-01-08 Pricing API
entry.summary: - postal_code is now required in availability location filter objects

entry.title: 2026-01-08 Kanban API
entry.summary: - New PUT /v1/kanban/org/default-board and DELETE /v1/kanban/org/default-board endpoints were added

entry.title: 2026-01-08 Metering API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/metering/readings/ endpoint was added for portal-authenticated meter reading submissions

entry.title: 2026-01-07 Data Management API
entry.summary: - New POST /data-management/v1/configs//jobs endpoint was added to manually trigger job runs

entry.title: 2025-12-31 Event Catalog API
entry.summary: - New Event Catalog API launched with endpoints to list events, retrieve configurations and schemas, generate sample payloads, update configuration, search event history, and trigger events

entry.title: 2025-12-30 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - GET /v2/portal/user/files and GET /v2/portal/user/files/count-by-entity are now deprecated

entry.title: 2025-12-30 Blueprint Manifest API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/blueprint-manifest/blueprints:marketplace endpoint was added for listing installed marketplace blueprints

entry.title: 2025-12-30 Metering API
entry.summary: - note field was renamed to remark on meter reading create and update operations

entry.title: 2025-12-26 Location Entity
entry.summary: - New location entity was introduced with address, addresshash, and entityrelations properties

entry.title: 2025-12-23 Pricing API
entry.summary: - New public external catalog endpoints were added for products and product recommendations

entry.title: 2025-12-22 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - Breaking: Meter reading note field was renamed to remark

entry.title: 2025-12-19 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New selfregistrationsetting values were added: ALWAYSCREATECONTACT, BLOCKIFPORTALUSEREXISTS, DISALLOW_COMPLETELY

entry.title: 2025-12-19 Data Management API
entry.summary: - New endpoints were added: get config by ID, list jobs with filtering, and job report download URL

entry.title: 2025-12-18 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - meter_id is now optional (deprecated) on consumption, costs, and prices endpoints

entry.title: 2025-12-17 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/integrations//events/replay endpoint was added

entry.title: 2025-12-14 Data Management API
entry.summary: - Breaking: Schedule schema simplified from daily/weekly/monthly variants to a single interval-based schedule with frequency and interval_days

entry.title: 2025-12-12 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New assignment_mode field was added to contract identification hook configuration

entry.title: 2025-12-12 Product API
entry.summary: - tax field on Price changed from an untyped schema to a BaseRelation reference

entry.title: 2025-12-11 Workflows Execution API
entry.summary: - New DELETE /v2/flows/executions//tasks/{taskid}/schedule endpoint was added to cancel scheduled tasks

entry.title: 2025-12-11 Tax Entity
entry.summary: - rate property type changed from string to number

entry.title: 2025-12-10 File API
entry.summary: - Multiple deprecated folder and collection endpoints were removed

entry.title: 2025-12-10 Email Template API
entry.summary: - New json_template field was added to template create, update, and response schemas

entry.title: 2025-12-10 Core Events
entry.summary: - New PaymentMethodUpdated event was introduced

entry.title: 2025-12-09 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/integrations//events endpoint was added for querying integration events

entry.title: 2025-12-09 Core Events
entry.summary: - New InstallmentUpdated event was introduced

entry.title: 2025-12-08 Data Management API
entry.summary: - New GET /data-management/v1/configs and POST /data-management/v1//configs endpoints were added

entry.title: 2025-12-08 IBAN API
entry.summary: - Breakingvalidate to POST /v1/public/iban:validate

entry.title: 2025-12-05 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/erp/updates/mapping_simulation endpoint was added for v2 mapping format simulation

entry.title: 2025-12-02 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - Breaking: Use case create/update request body changed to a discriminated union (CreateInboundUseCaseRequest | CreateOutboundUseCaseRequest)

entry.title: 2025-12-02 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/webhooks/configs//events/replay-batch endpoint was added for batch event replay

entry.title: 2025-12-01 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/erp/updates/events endpoint was added — v2 event processing using integration_id

entry.title: 2025-11-30 Data Management API
entry.summary: - New POST /data-management/v1//query endpoint was added

entry.title: 2025-11-28 Template Variables API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/template:replace endpoint was added, preserving original data types instead of stringifying

entry.title: 2025-11-27 Workflows Execution API
entry.summary: - New ON_HOLD status value was added to step and task status enum

entry.title: 2025-11-26 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New POST /v3/portal/partner//disable and POST /v3/portal/partner/{id}/enable endpoints were added

entry.title: 2025-11-26 Partner Directory API
entry.summary: - New partner user management endpoints were added: list users, create user, delete user, list roles, assign/unassign roles

entry.title: 2025-11-26 GenAI API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/genai/erp/mapping:generate endpoint was added for AI-generated ERP mapping configurations

entry.title: 2025-11-25 File API
entry.summary: - New File Collections API was introduced with CRUD endpoints, replacing the deprecated File Folders API

entry.title: 2025-11-25 Pricing API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/public/integration//products-recommendation endpoint was added

entry.title: 2025-11-25 Pricing API External Catalog
entry.summary: - Breaking: catalog_type field is now required in the request context

entry.title: 2025-11-24 Entity API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/entity:graph endpoint was added for traversing entity relationship graphs with configurable node schemas, edges, and cardinality

entry.title: 2025-11-23 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - Breaking: appid, hookid, and extension_id fields are now required in extension hook configuration (previously optional)

entry.title: 2025-11-20 Portal User Entity
entry.summary: - New represents relation was added

entry.title: 2025-11-20 Contact Entity
entry.summary: - represents_contact relation was removed

entry.title: 2025-11-19 Pricing API
entry.summary: - days was added as a billing duration unit across all duration fields (billing, notice, renewal, termination)

entry.title: 2025-11-19 Ticket Entity
entry.summary: - title was renamed to ticket_title

entry.title: 2025-11-19 Notes API
entry.summary: - createdby field changed from a plain string/number ID to a structured object with type, userid, display_name, and other fields

entry.title: 2025-11-18 Workflows Execution API
entry.summary: - New revert_execution option was added to task patch — resets succeeding tasks to PENDING when updating a previous task

entry.title: 2025-11-17 Pricing API
entry.summary: - New reference_date parameter was added to compute-price requests

entry.title: 2025-11-17 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - Three deprecated v1 failure endpoints were removed

entry.title: 2025-11-17 Journey Config API
entry.summary: - New logicsV4 field was added, supporting a more expressive logic rule format with per-rule IDs, conditions, actions, and settings

entry.title: 2025-11-14 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New Integration management CRUD endpoints were added: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /v1/integrations

entry.title: 2025-11-12 Asset Entity
entry.summary: - New asset entity was introduced with properties including title, serial number, manufacturer, model, maintenance dates, and relations to customer, contract, meter, and ticket

entry.title: 2025-11-10 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - payload field in event processing and mapping simulation now accepts a JSON object directly (previously only serialised strings)

entry.title: 2025-11-10 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New partner management endpoints were added: invite, list, resend invitation, and revoke

entry.title: 2025-11-07 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/portal/entity:get endpoint was added for retrieving a single entity by ID

entry.title: 2025-11-06 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - Breaking: Enum constraints on the schema field in page configuration were removed — now accepts any string slug

entry.title: 2025-11-06 Core Entities
entry.summary: - New external_id property was added to Contact, Contract, Billing Account, Meter, and Meter Counter entities

entry.title: 2025-11-06 Billing Account Entity
entry.summary: - billing_address field type changed from a relation reference to an inline address object

entry.title: 2025-11-04 Email Settings API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/email-settings/inbox-buckets endpoint was added

entry.title: 2025-11-03 Webhooks API
entry.summary: - New POST /v2/webhooks/configs//events endpoint was added for listing and filtering webhook events

entry.title: 2025-10-31 Message API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/message/threads/:move endpoint was added for moving threads between inboxes

entry.title: 2025-10-30 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - v2 mapping format support was added to mapping simulation with events mapping object

entry.title: 2025-10-29 Automation API
entry.summary: - New entityexists and entitydoesnotexist condition operations were added

entry.title: 2025-10-22 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New POST /v1/erp/updates/mapping_simulation endpoint was added for dry-running payload transformations

entry.title: 2025-10-22 GenAI API
entry.summary: - New GET /v1/genai/entity//{entity_id}/summary endpoint was added for retrieving AI-generated entity summaries

entry.title: 2025-10-17 ERP Integration API
entry.summary: - New deduplication_id field was added to event payloads for idempotency control

entry.title: 2025-10-15 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - New GET /v2/portal/billing/accounts/ endpoint was added

entry.title: 2025-10-14 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - Breaking: contracts and filtersschema were removed from entity search request; replaced by filterscontext

entry.title: 2025-10-13 Blueprint Manifest API
entry.summary: - All v1 blueprint manifest endpoints were deprecated in favor of v2

entry.title: 2025-10-09 Workflows Definition API
entry.summary: - New JourneyAutomationTrigger was added for journey-based automation triggers on flow templates

entry.title: 2025-10-08 Customer Portal API
entry.summary: - Breaking: ENDCUSTOMERPORTAL and INSTALLER_PORTAL enum values were removed from the origin parameter — now accepts any string

entry.title: 2025-10-08 Email Settings API
entry.summary: - New email address management endpoints were added: list, create, get, update, delete, provision, and set primary
